A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I can't believe I'm going to say this but I am not fan of Star Wars: The Last Jedi. I mean there were a few parts I enjoyed but for the most part I'm very disappointed. I left the first movie so excited and couldn't wait for the next one. It wasn't perfect but I was happy. I left the movie theater this time not even the least bit interested in seeing the next movie. I hope I feel differently once the trailers.
